name: Animal Link Classic
description:
Link Animal Classic is newest connect puzzle game. If you are a fan of Matching Game, then you gonna love this Link Animal Game.

HOT FEATURES:
- Free Game.
- 100% offline, no needs to connect to internet or wifi.
- Extremely lightweight, play at all times without wasting battery.
- Simple manipulation, classic gameplay.
- Suitable for all ages.

HOW TO PLAY LINK ANIMAL CLASSIC:
- Connect 2 similar images with up to 3 straight lines.
- Each level will limit time, game over when time runs out.
- Take advantage of help items to find help and swap items to overcome the level.
- The game screen later became more difficult, ended to compare rankings.

Enjoy playing the game!
